Bases: Migration

This is a Migration Class written extending/overwriting the Migration class of Django.

Here the Inventory, Menu, Order, User, MenuInventory, OrderMenu, and order Models are being initially created.

initial = True

app.migrations.0002_remove_user_is_manager_user_user_type_and_more module

class app.migrations.0002_remove_user_is_manager_user_user_type_and_more.Migration(name, app_label)

Bases: Migration

This is a Migration Class written extending/overwriting the Migration class of Django.

This class is dependent on the operations of “0001_initial.py”

This class does the following operations on the user model:

  • is_manager field is removed

  • user_type field is added with Customer, Cashier, and Manager choices

  • name field is altered with a maximum character length of 100

dependencies = [('app', '0001_initial')]
operations = [<RemoveField  model_name='user', name='is_manager'>, <AddField  model_name='user', name='user_type', field=<django.db.models.IntegerField>>, <AlterField  model_name='user', name='name', field=<django.db.models.CharField>>]

Bases: Migration

This is a Migration Class written extending/overwriting the Migration class of Django.

This class is dependent on the operations of “0003_remove_user_clocked_time.py”

This class does the following operations on the menuinventory model:

  • “inventory” is renamed to “inventory_id”

  • “menu” is renamed to “menu_id”

dependencies = [('app', '0003_remove_user_clocked_time')]

app.migrations.0006_alter_inventory_name_alter_menu_description_and_more module

class app.migrations.0006_alter_inventory_name_alter_menu_description_and_more.Migration(name, app_label)

Bases: Migration

This is a Migration Class written extending/overwriting the Migration class of Django.

This class is dependent on the operations of “0005_rename_inventory_id_menuinventory_inventory_and_more.py”

This class does the following operations:

  • name field in inventory is now a Text Field

  • description field in menu is now a Text Field

  • season_end field in menu is now a Character Field

  • season_start field in menu is now a Character Field

  • is_completed field in order is a Boolean Field

  • timestamp field in order is a Character Field

  • email field in user is a Unique Text Field

  • name field in user is a Character Field

  • user_type field in user is altered to have Customer, Cashier, and Manager choices

dependencies = [('app', '0005_rename_inventory_id_menuinventory_inventory_and_more')]
operations = [<AlterField  model_name='inventory', name='name', field=<django.db.models.TextField>>, <AlterField  model_name='menu', name='description', field=<django.db.models.TextField>>, <AlterField  model_name='menu', name='season_end', field=<django.db.models.CharField>>, <AlterField  model_name='menu', name='season_start', field=<django.db.models.CharField>>, <AlterField  model_name='order', name='is_completed', field=<django.db.models.BooleanField>>, <AlterField  model_name='order', name='timestamp', field=<django.db.models.CharField>>, <AlterField  model_name='user', name='email', field=<django.db.models.TextField>>, <AlterField  model_name='user', name='name', field=<django.db.models.CharField>>, <AlterField  model_name='user', name='user_type', field=<django.db.models.IntegerField>>]

app.migrations.0007_remove_order_is_completed_order_status_and_more module

class app.migrations.0007_remove_order_is_completed_order_status_and_more.Migration(name, app_label)

Bases: Migration

This is a Migration Class written extending/overwriting the Migration class of Django.

This class is dependent on the operations of “0006_alter_inventory_name_alter_menu_description_and_more.py”

This class does the following operations:

  • is_completed in order is removed

  • status field in order is added to order with In Progress, Completed, Incomplete, Deleted choices

  • season_end field in menu is now a Date Time Field

  • season_start field in menu is no a Date Time Field

  • employee field in order has a Customer foregin Key in user

  • timestamp field in order is now a Date Time Field

  • email field in user is now a Text Field

  • user_type field in user now has choices like Customer, Kitchen, Cashier, Manager, Admin

dependencies = [('app', '0006_alter_inventory_name_alter_menu_description_and_more')]
operations = [<RemoveField  model_name='order', name='is_completed'>, <AddField  model_name='order', name='status', field=<django.db.models.IntegerField>>, <AlterField  model_name='menu', name='season_end', field=<django.db.models.DateTimeField>>, <AlterField  model_name='menu', name='season_start', field=<django.db.models.DateTimeField>>, <AlterField  model_name='order', name='employee', field=<django.db.models.ForeignKey>>, <AlterField  model_name='order', name='timestamp', field=<django.db.models.DateTimeField>>, <AlterField  model_name='user', name='email', field=<django.db.models.TextField>>, <AlterField  model_name='user', name='user_type', field=<django.db.models.IntegerField>>]

This class is dependent on the operations of “0008_menu_display_alter_order_employee.py”

This class does the following operations:

  • category field in menu is a Integer Field with Burgers, Baskets, Sandwiches, Shakes n Sweets, Beverages, Sides and Sauces

  • description field in menu is now a Text Field
